cardDetailedText: We will be releasing 2,222 Deep Fried NFTs on Oct 31st at 13:00 UTC. Want our distribution to be fair and straight forward, so once the sale goes live it will stay open until sold out.
The first 100 members to join our Discord server will receive an OG role as a thank-you. This gives access to OG's only chat where we will hold exclusive giveaways and more!

Deep Fried NFTs will be available on secondary marketplaces shortly after selling out. We'll be approaching markets like Solanart, SolSea, Magic Eden, and DigitalEyes to discuss which location will best fit our project.
We'll donate 10% of the revenue to Feeding America once the 2,222 Deep Fried NFTs have been minted. A portion of the secondary market sales will also be donated to Feeding America.
We'll be holding Solana raffles where we will give away Deep Fried NFTs and SOL to Deep Fried NFT owners.
